g.text: Collect as much flower as you can. Use 'N' key to go left,
'M' key to go right and 'Z' key to jump. Guards are
going to stop you on the way. Use the spacebar to shoot
and kill them. Pick up the flowers and go to the exit
quickly. Each flower worth 5 points, and guard worth 10
points. Every remain sec worth 5 points. You can earn
double points in zoom mode, which is much harder.
